page.title: 02TOURISM
page.content: Tourism is Ilfracombe's main industry and creates many jobs for people throughout the summer months.People come to Ilfracombe for many reasons some may go to the beach and visit surrounding tourist attractions.Older people might like to enjoy the natural scenery and take walks.Younger people can come and enjoy night-clubs and pubs.Many tourists stay at bed and breakfast Guest-Houses.Also there are hotels,chalets,flats and nearby sites for tents and caravans.People come to Ilfracombe from all over the country and use all sorts of transport to get here.Many come by car, others by coach.Once there was a railway which was opened in 1874 and had a big effect on tourism.But in 1970 the line was closed because it was considered unprofitable and now the nearest line is at Barnstaple.
